Content.Text:
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, hello!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, how is your work going?
Everything running smoothly?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If there's anything we can help you
with, just go ahead and tell us.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone, you're all gathered here?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, Dunhill. Did you need something?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was looking for you all, because I've
got something to give you, actually.
This!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've been collecting photos of the town
and its people for the past few months.
<PAGE>
This seemed like a good chance to make
an album for each of us, using these
photos.
<PAGE>
This album is for you, Rebecca. Please
take a look.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, how thoughtful! Thank you, Dunhill!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Emma, Camellia, here are yours. Please
enjoy them.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dunhill.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My thanks for your trouble.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not at all. I love to take photos, so it
really was no trouble.
<PAGE>
That's all I wanted to do, anyway. I'm
going to find the others and give them
their albums too.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, there are some great shots in here.
Dunhill is pretty good with that camera!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes! I look about 30% more beautiful
than I normally do! The composition of
these shots is really great, too.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
They certainly are very lovely.
<PAGE>
Just when do you think he took these
photos? I don't remember it at all.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You're right. He always has that camera
with him but I don't think I've ever
seen him use it.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Me neither. If he's been taking this
many pictures, you would think we'd
all have seen him snapping away.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
How's he doing it? I really want to
know!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I bet he's moving so fast that you can't
even see him taking the picture!
<PAGE>
I reckon Dunhill could do that.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
These pictures are taken from a variety
of angles too, though...
<PAGE>
Can he move to these positions and then
take a photo without anyone seeing him
do it?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
H-Hey, can we just stop talking about
this now? It almost sounds like you're
talking about a g-ghost...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Rebecca! Don't say anything like that,
especially when it comes to Dunhill!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That reminds me. The next town over had
a bit of a ghost scare recently.
<PAGE>
Numerous people said there was a flash,
like a camera, and when they turned to
look...
<PAGE>
There was a man standing there, who then
suddenly vanished!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
N-No way! That couldn't be Dunhill too,
could it?
What couldn't?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Kyaaah!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Emma? Are you okay? Is something the
matter?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Y-You just surprised me, is all.
<PAGE>
What brings you back here, anyway,
Dunhill?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I also made an album for <MYNAME>, of
course, but I forgot to hand it over.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here you go, <MYNAME>. That one is very
special.
<PAGE>
Watching you gives me an itchy trigger
finger, actually! I can't believe I've
taken so many shots of you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all I needed to do, anyway.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, look at all these pictures of
you! Is that... normal?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
All of these pictures of the rest of us,
and now all these additional ones of
<MYNAME>? How mysterious!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Tell us, <MYNAME>, do you ever recall
seeing Dunhill with a camera at any of
the times in these photos?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
For the sake of the town, I think we
need to stop thinking about this.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yes, you're right. There are some things
in this world that we simply are better
off not knowing about.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Let us never talk of this again.
